__TOC__

LoCos do an amazing job of promoting and show casing Ubuntu around the world. From release parties to mini conferences, giving talks and many more activities.  I'm hoping to gather a list of events that teams run this is benefical to see what kind of events are being organised as you may not have thought it was possible to do that. By listing the different types of events that LoCos organise and how many people attend and how often they are organised. It's a great way to see community involvement. 

Please add your team to the list and sort it Alphabetically. If you are listing more than one event please add it under your team name. Please only add events from 2009 to current date.
